title: Was a Man ‘Beaten to Death’ Outside Rep. Lauren Boebert’s Restaurant?
subtitle: The controversial Republican congresswoman has repeatedly cited a fatal assault as the catalyst for her decision to carry a handgun at all times. What actually happened?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A man was once "beaten to death" "outside" U.S. Rep. Lauren Boebert's restaurant in Rifle, Colorado.
